about_the_game:
In collaboration with the Strategic Music studio we have recorded a live-performed orchestral soundtrack, enhanced with vivid sound effects specifically for War Thunder.

When creating the soundtrack for War Thunder, we wanted to stay true to the WWII period, but at the same time to create music filled with action, which is appropriate for epic breathtaking air, ground and naval battles.

Now you can purchase on Steam inspiring melodies that you can hear both in battles and in the hangar!
